A.D, 324. arose about tht natrte oflhrist 1115111111111 Arius
arod Athaosius; similar in nature to Good, mul the latter, who
set forth the views of Altstander, 1115111111 1.11 11155511111111. that
1.1111111 and His Father were of one and the same nature.
